value:
$WmMPID_ファ,ch02_14_Idenn_FF_Pair,Face|This time, we can all play together!
Hippity hop-hop!$k$p$nMPID_比翼イドゥン|...Hop.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭バアトル,ch02_02_Bartr_M_SpringFes20,Face|You've done well to get this far,
but I, er...HOP you know what
you're up against now!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭フィル,ch02_01_Fir_F_SpringFes20,Face|This training has put a real spring
in our step! Let's use our advantage
while we have it! ...Hop, hop!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭エスト,ch01_20_Est_F_SpringFes20,Face|I have to clinch this win to impress
my sisters! Gotta keep on hopping
until we reach victory!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ナーシェン,ch02_12_Nacien_M_SpringFes20,Face|Heh... This look is devastating! Words
fail to capture it! So come closer...
I'll show you true devastation!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_春祭フィル,ch02_01_Fir_F_SpringFes20,Face|Oh no... We lost! I'm sorry, Father.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭バアトル,ch02_02_Bartr_M_SpringFes20,Face|Don't fret, my daughter! You fought
well! I'm proud to have stood beside
you on the field.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭フィル,ch02_01_Fir_F_SpringFes20,Face|Aww... Father!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭バアトル,ch02_02_Bartr_M_SpringFes20,Face|I just wish your mother could have
seen us out there...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭フィル,ch02_01_Fir_F_SpringFes20,Face|Seeing us spending time together
would surely draw out a smile.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭バアトル,ch02_02_Bartr_M_SpringFes20,Face|Yes, that rarest of smiles...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭フィル,ch02_01_Fir_F_SpringFes20,Face|Anyway, that's enough reminiscing.
The festivities aren't nearly over yet.
I want to see it all while we can!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭バアトル,ch02_02_Bartr_M_SpringFes20,Face|A fine idea. Let's go, Fir!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭フィル,ch02_01_Fir_F_SpringFes20,Face|H-hey! ...Faaaatherrrr!
...Wait for ME!$k$p$Sbs150|
